name: Carrot EVO - Merge & Match Puzzle Game
name_original: Carrot EVO - Merge & Match Puzzle Game
description:
WELCOME to the funniest Carrot Evolution puzzle adventure!

The ultimate match-3 puzzle game with unique gameplay! It is Carrot EVO time!
Match three or more carrots to let them grow into bigger ones. Your talent in merging them into bigger carrots and get higher scores while playing this super addictive game.

Features:
* Stunning graphics and delightful music effect
* Fantastic gameplay elements: merge lovely carrots into bigger ones and get the final bomb to have a big BLAST
* Play at anytime, anywhere, no WIFI needed
* Invite your Facebook friends and enjoy the endless fun
* Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master

Enjoy Carrot EVO? Learn more about the game!
Facebook: @playmilstudio
Instagram: @Playmilstudio

Questions? Contact us via E-mail: playmilstudio@outlook.com


Enjoy! :)
